alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:48PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Box Elder and northeastern Tooele Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 348 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 35 miles southwest of Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway to 7 miles south of Utah Test and Training Range North to near Knolls. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Delle, Utah Test and Training Range North, Clive, Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, Hat Island, Lakeside and Gunnison Island. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 41 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
